room_title: Escape room "Edison’s Lost Invention" by Escape Room Downtown in Canton
room_description: Six wooden crates were uncovered in the attic of a Uniontown home before it was demolished. It’s believed these boxes were left in Stark County by Thomas Edison who made regular visits here. Do these crates contain the final  invention Edison was working on before he expired in 1931? We’ll need your team of clever investigators to help us open and explore the six boxes.
